title: Purge leaked tokens (filter-repo plan)

title: Add detect-secrets + pre-commit
description: Add detect-secrets scanning and pre-commit hooks, produce baseline and CI enforcement.

title: Mock Telegram harness
description: Provide minimal HTTP mock for Telegram (/sendMessage) and an integration dry-run test. (Local + CI)

title: Retryer backoff tests
description: Add deterministic unit tests for retry/backoff behavior on 429 and 5xx responses.

title: Normalize todos into NDJSON
description: Convert consolidated TODO snapshot into machine-friendly NDJSON and store at `doc/todo-archive.ndjson`.

title: Create GH issues for critical/high items
description: Batch-create GitHub issues for top critical/high backlog items and link them to NDJSON entries.

title: Run pytest smoke and record results
description: Run a smoke test of the test suite and record summary (passed/failed counts) into sprint artifacts.

title: alby_agent dry-run prototype
description: Scaffold and run `alby_agent` dry-run to automate merges/validations and collect metrics.

task: Open PR to fix CI workflow

title: Run pytest smoke and record results
description: Run a smoke test of the test suite and record summary (passed/failed counts).

description: Collect file list, scan results, and evidence for purge plan.

description: Enrich MASTER_BACKLOG with owners and scrum points for top items.

description: Prototype an opt-in, approval-gated updater that can create/update GitHub items; must write audit records to `gaia.db`.

description: Operational checklist for running session syncs, gating, and rollback steps.

title: CI: dry-run create/update GH issues
